EmailTemplate.subject: Your invitation to The Challenge Society Festival!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Your invite to The Challenge Society Festival!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Hopefully by now you have been along to one of our Challenge Society events and are looking forward to our next BIG CHALLENGE DAY! We are proud to announce The Festival during the February half term!
We would love to invite you to this event and give you the chance to attend an amazing reunion for 2012 graduates brought to you by The Challenge Society! It takes place on Friday 22nd February at Strawberry Hill House, 268 Waldegrave Road, Twickenham, TW1 4ST with plenty of interactive workshops and great performances to end a fun-filled day!
Check out your video invite clicking here.
Find out more and reserve your place now on www.thechallengesociety.org with your personal login details below:
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
This event has limited availability - don't miss out, reserve your space NOW!
If you have any questions, please contact us at the thefestival@the-challenge.org. Remember to visit facebook.com/thechallengesociety and follow us on twitter @UK_TCS for all the latest news and opportunities!
We look forward to seeing you at The Festival next month!
The Challenge Team
